name: SpiceCheck
0:
”Alexa, Start Spice Check”
”I'm Cooking Chicken”
”I'm Cooking Toast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spice check
des: This is not a serious app... yet. Laying the foundation for an AI powered condiment matching system. For now say what your eating and you'll be told a random spice to improve your meal.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
